An inventor who works for Kinetech Laboratories, has developed a robot with a mission to search for and rescue people in danger and gave his creation the ability to imitate human actions and emotions. After discovering that the advanced microchip machine will be used in military operations, the inventor program the robot to escape so suffer some damage. Twenty years later, Henry finds the boy robot broken, fix it and give you the name Cody. No memories of the past, Cody becomes the best friend of Henry, helping him win his beloved, winning contests and learn to have fun.
